languages.text: Whenever a Chaos Space Marine is targeted by {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда космодесантник Хаоса становится целью {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g}, он получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever a Chaos Space Marine is targeted by perils of the warp, it gains an extra turn.

Whenever a Chaos Space Marine is targeted by {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando un Marine Espacial del Caos es objetivo de las {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}, recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a Chaos Space Marine is targeted by {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un Marine Espacial del Caos es objetivo de las {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}, recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}.

languages.text: 每当混沌星际战士受到{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}影响时，该角色会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 每当混沌星际战士受到{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}影响时，该角色会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。

languages.text: Ist ein Chaos-Space Marine das Ziel von {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}, erhält er einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}zusätzlichen Zug{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a Chaos Space Marine is targeted by {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer ein Chaos-Space Marine das Ziel von {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} ist, erhält er einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}zusätzlichen Zug{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un Space Marine du Chaos est la cible de {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}, il gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}.
